PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION: Smart chatbot powered by Google Gemini
CONFIG_DESC: Set your Google AI Studio API key to enable the AI chatbot across all servers.
API_KEY_DESC: Get your free API key at aistudio.google.com. This key is stored securely in the database.
ENABLE_DESC: Allow the bot to respond to messages in the configured channel or when mentioned.
CH_DESC: The bot will automatically respond to all messages sent in this channel.
